About Me

A Few things about me..

BIO

Im Jake, a recent graduate of the GA Tech Full Stack Development Program. I have always carried an interest in connected technologies in our lives from day to day and look foreward to a career in development as soon as possible.

Currently, my stengths are HTML, CSS and Javascript web applications but moving foreward I am continueing to develop my skill in more complicated frameworks like React and Handlebars.

On the server side of things, I am proficient using express, and am working on broadening my portfolio with applications built in node and deployed to heroku which demonstrate mysql functionality.

Please take a look at my portfolio of projects, and I will continue to update it as I complete further projects.

HTML, CSS, and Javascript

Proficient in constructing content using html, varying CSS frameworks, and numerous Javascript Libraries.

Full Stack Integration

Experience in building full stack applications with a focus in node and express servers. Familiar with many popular deployment environments.

Education

Ga Tech Coding Bootcamp
-Certified in Full Stack Web Development
